医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示镰状细胞病患者大脑老化患有镰状细胞病（一种慢性疾病，畸形的粘性血细胞聚集在一起，减少向器官输送氧气）的患者中风和由此导致的认知障碍的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-brain-aging-in-sickle-cell-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-brain-aging-in-sickle-cell-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bcc0aaf-7bca-42c9-a64e-53e6b40d65d2 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:20:00 -0500 Study reveals brain aging in sickle cell patients
香烟烟雾改变肺部免疫细胞功能吸烟非常普遍且致命，但我们对香烟烟雾实际上如何导致严重呼吸道疾病的了解并不完整，这严重阻碍了有效治疗方法的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Cigarette-smoke-alters-immune-cell-function-in-the-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Cigarette-smoke-alters-immune-cell-function-in-the-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b78887ef-9d46-4aac-a1d3-1ed9e8d8f946 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:11:00 -0500 Cigarette smoke alters immune cell function in the lungs
评估诊断肝硬化患者轻微肝性脑病的生物标志物神经退行性生物标志物——神经丝轻链 (NfL)、神经胶质原纤维酸性蛋白 (GFAP)、tau 蛋白和泛素羧基末端水解酶 L1 (UCHL1)——在诊断轻微肝性脑病 (MHE) 方面的表现尚未得到系统评估，同时，它们与明显肝性脑病 (OHE) 的发展也没有关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Evaluating-biomarkers-for-diagnosing-minimal-hepatic-encephalopathy-in-cithrotic-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Evaluating-biomarkers-for-diagnosing-minimal-hepatic-encephalopathy-in-cithrotic-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6ed8f42-3364-4098-a6a6-e6dc984fb29e Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:54:00 -0500 Evaluating biomarkers for diagnosing minimal hepatic encephalopathy in cirrhotic patients
研究揭示了手的大小如何影响体重感知研究人员评估了人类对身体部位（特别是手）的大小和重量的感知，将其与对物体的感知进行比较，并得出结论：它们是不同的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-sheds-light-on-how-hand-size-influences-weight-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-sheds-light-on-how-hand-size-influences-weight-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d303380d-2728-44f6-9a4e-ee90bc583de6 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:47:00 -0500 Study sheds light on how hand size influences weight perception
新的兔模型提供了对 CF 相关胰腺内分泌病理学的见解囊性纤维化（CF）是一种影响多个器官系统的危及生命的遗传性疾病，其中胰腺功能障碍是一种严重且经常被忽视的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-rabbit-model-provides-insights-into-CF-lated-pancreatic-endocrine-pathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-rabbit-model-provides-insights-into-CF-lated-pancreatic-endocrine-pathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d3fda49-d934-4291-80e5-efd8b33165ef Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:39:00 -0500 New rabbit model provides insights into CF-related pancreatic endocrine pathology
细胞外囊泡 miRNA 作为急性心肌梗死的潜在早期生物标志物宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。本研究旨在确定细胞外囊泡 (EV) microRNA (miRNA) 作为 AMI 早期诊断生物标志物的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Extracellular-vesicle-miRNAs-as-potential-early-biomarkers-for-acute-myocardial-infarction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Extracellular-vesicle-miRNAs-as-potential-early-biomarkers-for-acute-myocardial-infarction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a64c4c7b-201d-48b8-94ca-d3d989ff04cb Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:31:00 -0500 Extracellular vesicle miRNAs as potential early biomarkers for acute myocardial infarction
SOX9 过表达通过 AMPK 激活防止 MASH 中的脂质积累转录因子性别决定区 Y 相关高迁移率组盒基因 9 (SOX9) 在器官发育中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/SOX9-overexpress-protects-against-lipid-accumulation-in-MASH-via-AMPK-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/SOX9-overexpress-protects-against-lipid-accumulation-in-MASH-via-AMPK-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75d4ad9b-3712-4ef8-a6ef-a54ac3c1a643 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:23:00 -0500 SOX9 overexpression protects against lipid accumulation in MASH via AMPK activation
DDR2 增强 BMP 依赖性骨再生并减少异位骨化外伤、骨折或疾病导致的骨质流失是全球健康面临的重大挑战，通常会导致长期残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/DDR2-enhances-BMP-dependent-bone-regenesis-and-reduces-heterotopic-ossification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/DDR2-enhances-BMP-dependent-bone-regenesis-and-reduces-heterotopic-ossification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76d1bac9-8016-4aa8-a5de-ff4d5abcec50 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:14:00 -0500 DDR2 enhances BMP-dependent bone regeneration and reduces heterotopic ossification
探索 EpCAM 在早期肝细胞癌进展中的作用宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。上皮细胞粘附分子（EpCAM）是上皮细胞源性肿瘤的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Exploring-the-role-of-EpCAM-in-early-stage-hepatocellular-carcinoma-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Exploring-the-role-of-EpCAM-in-early-stage-hepatocellular-carcinoma-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abe2e163-8dfc-4802-a091-ea255178577c Fri, 17 Jan 2025 14:05:00 -0500 Exploring the role of EpCAM in early-stage hepatocellular carcinoma progression
与肥胖引起的心力衰竭相关的关键生物标志物宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。许多研究报道肥胖导致心力衰竭（HF）发病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Key-biomarkers-linked-to-obesity-induced-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Key-biomarkers-linked-to-obesity-induced-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9abd371-af41-4414-bd75-871b101f5eae Fri, 17 Jan 2025 13:56:00 -0500 Key biomarkers linked to obesity-induced heart failure
